description: Provides summarised output from various actions that could otherwise eat up tokens and cause crashes.

apiKey.description: API key for the selected provider.

provider.description: AI provider to use. Supported values: ANTHROPIC, OPENAI, OPENAI-COMPATIBLE, GOOGLE.

mcpWorkingDir.description: Fallback directory for trying to find files with relative paths from.

providerBaseUrl.description: Custom API endpoint for OpenAI-compatible providers.

summarizationCharThreshold.description: Character count threshold for when to summarize.
